General.Name: LX Hausys Ltd Preferred
General.Description: LX Hausys, Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of building and interior products, industrial films, and automotive products in South Korea and internationally. The company offers building and interior products, including flooring, wallcovering, interior film, uPVC window, and functional glass products, as well as products under the HI-MACS and Viatera names. It also provides industrial films, such as foils, signs and graphics, vinyl coated materials, photocatalyst materials, and micro-sized polymers. In addition, the company offers automotive skins, and lightweight and automotive components. The company was formerly known as LG Hausys, Ltd. and changed its name to LX Hausys, Ltd. in July 2021. LX Hausys, Ltd. is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
